title: Email Scraping – Build List of 1,000 Contacts in the Pregnancy/Parenting/Mommy Blogger Niche
snippet:
I'm looking for someone to compile information of people who are active within the Pregnancy/Parenting/Mommy Blogger community. We'll use this list to manually recruit new users for our startup. You will deliver the information in a spreadsheet, which should include:

– Name
– Email Address
– Blog/Website URL
– Instagram OR Twitter Handle

It's not necessary that each lead have massive influence. However, they should fit within the following criteria:

– Greater than 1,000 followers on social media
– Parenting Focused
– Based in United States
